text.more:
On the 4th September 2017, UK McDonald's employees went on strike for the first time. The hastag used to promote the strike on social media was '#McStrike'.

As part of WISERD Civil Society research, we collected over 90,000 tweets containing '#McStrike' from the 28th August-10th September 2017.

This network illustrates all retweets from Wednesday 30th August. Tweets were collected using COSMOS Open Data Analytics (https://http://socialdatalab.net/software) and visualised using Gephi (https://gephi.org). Data were collected and analysed by Dr Wil Chivers, Dr Helen Blakely and Dr Steve Davies, with assistance from Katie Dickson and Sam Jones.
